recipe.title: Citrus Pumpkin Pie With Grand Marnier Cream
ingredients: Garnish: 3 tablespoons chopped candied orange peel.
instructions: Mix lemon peel and orange peel into Perfect Pumpkin Pie filling. Bake and cool as directed.
Beat chilled whipping cream, sugar, and Grand Marnier until peaks form. Spread over pie. Garnish with candied orange peel.
Do Ahead Can be made 1 day ahead. Cover and chill.
Can be made 1 day ahead. Cover and chill.
